thread.title: Messi’s father in trouble
thread.title_full: Messi’s father in trouble | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: Messi’s father in trouble
text:
MADRID — The father of Argentina star Lionel Messi could face 18 months in prison for fiscal fraud following a request by the Barcelona public prosecutor Tuesday.
Messi himself, however, will not face charges after being exonerated of all accusations, with the prosecutor saying he had blindly followed his father’s “instructions.”
The pair were accused in 2013 of defrauding the taxman out of 4.16 million euros ($4.69 million) in taxes related to Messi’s image rights between 2007 and 2009 through the creation of fake companies in Belize and Uruguay.
Four-time world player of the year Messi is the fourth richest sportsman in the world, according to Forbes magazine which estimates he earns $64.7 million a year. — AFP
